item.description:
Join players of all levels as we get together for some rallies and Tennis Games. The game plan is to warm-up with some rallies and then break out into some games or singles, doubles and round robin play! We are here to have fun, get to know each other and play Tennis!

Braintree High School offers plenty of opportunity to play tennis on its 6 tennis courts and two practice backboards.

This is a great opportunity to just show-up and play!

*Day, Date & Time: Saturday October 17th
*Location: Braintree High School
*Meeting Place: At the Tennis Courts between the practice boards and door to the courts on the side of fields (not the street/parking side).
*Alternate Meeting Place: Look for us on one of the courts. Courts are first-come-first-serve and we try to get courts next to each other. We try to play on the courts by the backboards.


*Event Organizer(s): None.

*Fees: Annual Members & Org Team - Free, Members and Guests - 2

*Min/Max: Currently, there is no maximum. We need at least 4 Yes RSVPs by Noon on Friday, October 16th for this event to take place.

*Guests: 2 per member

*RSVP Deadline: Noon on Friday, October 16h. (Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer until after the event.)

In Case of Inclement Weather:
If it is raining the event will be cancelled. Heavy rains will cancel. All Yes RSVPs will be emailed shortly after the RSVP Deadline with more info.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

*Directions: Posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board (Pinned, so they're on the first page.)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting by the entrance to the Tennis Courts next to the two green practice boards near the basketball court and softball field. If the courts are crowded look for us on one of the courts.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Morning Tennis
